name: Katina Saga 8: The Vault
description:
Katina must break free from the Federation and then invade the Vault to get the final two God Artifacts, but Hu-Man and Professor Xander have other plans. Follow the exciting storyline and cool minigames to find out what happens to Katina in the newest edition of the Katina Saga.

This game would best be described as a visual novel with mini games dispersed throughout.
